description:
In the 4th and final Episode of “Diary of a Madman,” the situation is grim for Victoria Voxxx. Her escape attempt has failed, so now, after betraying her captor’s trust, she must endure his wrath. He canes her, waterboards her, and crops her. He torments her with a double-zipper of clothespins, which are ripped from her flesh at her most vulnerable moment. Episode 4 is the culmination of a psychotic man’s twisted fantasy, carried out in a calculated fashion, with the intent that his victim understand his true power, even as he sees the entire scenario through a warped, reality-free lens where he is the good guy.

All 4 episodes of this series:
Episode 1: “The Hunt:
Episode 2: “Working The New Pet”
Episode 3: “The Test”
Episode 4: “Problem Solved”
title: Diary of a Madman, Episode 4: "Problem Solved"
